statements: SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM market_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT date, open_price, high_price FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM market_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY close_price DESC;
SELECT AVG(open_price) AS avg_open_price, AVG(close_price) AS avg_close_price FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'MSFT';
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM market_data WHERE symbol='AAPL' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT AVG(open_price), MAX(high_price), MIN(low_price) FROM market_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE close_price > 100 AND high_price < 150 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT symbol, SUM(close_price) AS total_close_price FROM market_data GROUP BY symbol HAVING total_close_price > 100000;
SELECT * FROM market_data;
SELECT stock_name, opening_price, closing_price FROM market_data ORDER BY market_date DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, volume FROM market_data WHERE opening_price > 100 ORDER BY closing_price ASC, volume DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, risk_score, risk_classification FROM risk_analysis WHERE risk_score > 3.5 AND analysis_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT MAX(closing_price) AS max_closing_price, MIN(opening_price) AS min_opening_price FROM market_data;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE closing_price > 100 ORDER BY market_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_name, opening_price FROM market_data WHERE volume > 10000 ORDER BY stock_name ASC, market_date DESC;
SELECT id, stock_symbol, risk_score FROM risk_analysis WHERE risk_score > 3.5 ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT stock_name, market_date, closing_price FROM market_data WHERE market_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY closing_price ASC;
SELECT rd.stock_symbol, rd.volume, ra.risk_classification FROM market_data rd JOIN risk_analysis ra ON rd.stock_symbol = ra.stock_symbol WHERE ra.analysis_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM market_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, opening_price, closing_price FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM market_summary WHERE total_trades > 1000 ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT symbol, opening_price, closing_price FROM market_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(risk_score) AS avg_risk_score FROM risk_analysis;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, date, closing_price FROM market_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT symbol, opening_price, closing_price, highest_price, lowest_price FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, AVG(closing_price) AS average_closing_price FROM market_data GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT s.symbol, s.total_trades, m.opening_price, r.risk_score FROM market_summary s JOIN market_data m ON s.symbol = m.symbol JOIN risk_analysis r ON m.data_id = r.data_id;
SELECT * FROM historical_market_data;
SELECT symbol, price, date FROM historical_market_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, price FROM historical_market_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_analysis WHERE risk_type = 'High Risk';
SELECT symbol, event_date, event_description FROM market_events WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM historical_market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, price FROM historical_market_data ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT AVG(price) FROM historical_market_data GROUP BY symbol HAVING AVG(price) > 50;
SELECT symbol, COUNT(*) FROM market_trends GROUP BY symbol HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5;
SELECT MAX(price), MIN(price) FROM historical_market_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT date, close_price FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, sentiment FROM market_analysis ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT event, description FROM market_events WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT index_name, value FROM market_indices WHERE value > 1000 ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM market_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT symbol, sentiment FROM market_analysis WHERE risk_score > 75 ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT trend, trend_start, trend_end FROM market_trends WHERE trend = 'Up';
SELECT index_name, value FROM market_indices ORDER BY value DESC;
